verses.name: 1 Kings 10:1
verses.text: And when the queen of Sheba heard of the fame of Solomon concerning the name of the Lord, she came to prove him with hard questions.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:2
verses.text: And she came to Jerusalem with a very great train, with camels that bare spices, and very much gold, and precious stones: and when she was come to Solomon, she communed with him of all that was in her heart.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:3
verses.text: And Solomon told her all her questions: there was not any thing hid from the king, which he told her not.
